pages.text: The people around you have already helped you in one or the other dicey situation. It's time to give something back. A little $(l:resources/sparklestone)Shimmerstone$(/l) allows you to explode the package in a shower of particles.$(br2)Select it and click with on other items to add them to the Present. Seal it in a Crafting Grid using one or more $(l:general/pigment)Pigments$() for the particle shower.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Then all you have to do is place it down for the gift recipient to open it and watch them jump of joy. (Or, you know, you can always gift yourself!)
